column2: U.S. regulators close inquiries into Ford
column4: May 8 U.S. auto safety regulators closed two separate probes into vehicles made by Ford Motor Co  and Chrysler Group LLC after the two U.S. automakers conducted safety recalls this year to fix glitches in some models.
